product_name: RockShox 30 Gold TK Suspension Fork - 100mm Travel - 26" Wheel Size
long_description: This RockShox 30 Gold TK Suspension Fork for 26-in. wheels supplies a plush, responsive and tuneable 100mm of travel so you can ride your favorite singletrack confidently and comfortably.
short_description: This RockShox 30 Gold TK Suspension Fork for 26-in. wheels supplies a plush, responsive and tuneable 100mm of travel so you can ride your favorite singletrack confidently and comfortably.
